long_description: Made with a stretchy moisture-wicking fabric blend, this baby-soft Lole Jogs Cardigan women's hoodie in is a fabulous layering top for cross-country skiing or any outdoor winter activity. Lole Jogs Cardigan women's hoodie protects skin during sunny days with a UPF 50+ rating. Thumbhole at sleeves; full-zip; hood; curved bottom; 1 zippered hand pocket; reflective logo.
short_description: Made with a stretchy moisture-wicking fabric blend, this baby-soft Lole Jogs Cardigan women's hoodie in is a fabulous layering top for cross-country skiing or any outdoor winter activity.
